body_html: @yongtang thanks for taking this on! CUB for weights == 1 case will be great. Avoiding code duplication by calling the gpu kernel that already exists for unsorted_segment_sum in the case where weight != None will also be very helpful!
body_text: @yongtang thanks for taking this on!  CUB for weights == 1 case will be great.  Avoiding code duplication by calling the gpu kernel that already exists for unsorted_segment_sum in the case where weight != None will also be very helpful!
body: @yongtang thanks for taking this on!  CUB for weights == 1 case will be great.  Avoiding code duplication by calling the gpu kernel that already exists for unsorted_segment_sum in the case where weight != None will also be very helpful!
